conbody.p: Most map structures depend on the specific content in the particular deliverable. You create that structure by combining and nesting map elements as needed. You must begin your map with a title, but all other elements can be interspersed as needed.

ul.li:
<map> (mandatory)
<title> (mandatory)
<topicmeta> (optional)
Any number, at any level, and in any order of the following:
<topichead>
<topicgroup>
<mapref>
<topicref>
<reltable> (optional)

conbody.p: uses the following map templates to enforce standard structures of certain documents, regardless of the product or group producing them.
